name: Dragon - Round
description:
Our Signature soap is combination of glycerin and shea butter with an uplifting fragrance of deep woods, dreamy florals and just a hint of musk. A captivating combination to tame even the Wildest Beast!

	Natural glycerin keeps skin soft and supple. Our glycerin base is made from pure vegetable oils with added glycerin to ensure a gentle, non-drying cleansing bar. We have added 5% crushed shea butter to our glycerin base . Shea butter is one of the natural ingredients which does not inhibit the skin's normal functions yet provides excellent cleansing and lingering moisturizing.

	Dragon soap swirl patterns vary between bars and we will be changing colors between batches (blue dragons, green dragons, purple dragons-you get the idea.)

	Our Rounds are approximately 4.2 ounces each and come in three different designs each with Celtic inspired detailing.  (Random Selection)

name: The Black Ship - Round
description:
Hoist the Jolly Roger and crack open another keg of grog! Our black glycerin bar is liberally laced with the tropical scents of Mango, Coconut , Pineapple and, of course, Bay Rum! A perfect mix for the swash-buckling, rum-swigging pirate lad or lass! Yo-Ho! Yo-Ho! It's a Pirate's Life for Me! Yo-Ho!

	Natural glycerin keeps skin soft and supple. Our glycerin base is made from pure vegetable oils with added glycerin to ensure a gentle, non-drying cleansing bar.

	Our Rounds are approximately 4.2 ounces each and come in three different designs each with Celtic inspired detailing.  (Random Selection)

name: Viking Mead - Round
description:
Natural glycerin soap with a generous amount of soothing honey and dash of vitamin E oil. This skin softening amber bar with its intoxicating honey mead scent is sure to please even the most rampaging berserker. Indulgence without consequence!

	Natural glycerin keeps skin soft and supple. Our glycerin base is made from pure vegetable oils with added glycerin to ensure a gentle, non-drying cleansing bar.

	Our Rounds are approximately 4.2 ounces each and come in three different designs each with Celtic inspired detailing.  (Random Selection)

name: Dragon Gift Pack
description:
A gift pack containing an oval Dragon soap, Dragon Bath Salts and a Dragon's Egg Bath Bomb.

Our gift bag is made from recycled paper, hand stamped and tied with a curled ribbon.

name: Fire Gift Pack
description:
A gift pack containing an oval Fire soap, Fire Bath Salts and a Fireball Bath Bomb!

	Our gift bag is made from recycled paper, hand stamped and tied with a curled ribbon.
